Articles.Content:
I cover up the sun with a giant, cosmic smiley face.

My dark planet.

The sun burns the paper face.

Tery215's light planet.

The sun explodes. It destroys the planet.

My newly formed nebula.

I draw [angry faces on the nebula](http://imgur.com/QRFgTif) from the safety of my spaceship. Also the window has crayon on it.

My spaceship.

**Edited <time datetime="2014-10-25T23:46:39Z" title="10/25/2014 11:46  PM" data-short="9 yr">October 25, 2014</time> by Tery215**

[post REDACTED, IT BREAKS SO MANY RULES]

My RC car with suggestive imagery on its side.

I put a bowl over it.

My trap for RC cars.

I destroy the megaverse and the universe, and all other dimensions.

I create a quadri-dimensional based universe, and make it mine.

My universe

Sorry, your existence is cancelled and you cannot create any dimensions because you do not exist.

My quantum foam or whatever.

I somehow reinstate myself in the know realm and take your quantum foam to make graffitis on Megatiger's megaverse.

My quantum foam.

Your quantum foam disappears into the sixth dimension. Upon doing so, a hill materializes around you, trapping you inside.

The dimension shift also brings me back to life from where I was trampled by a herd of mudkips, oh, three or four pages ago, I think. I claim thy hill.

A mega Uzi pops out of the ground and shoots you.

My hill.

I delete existence.

My inexistence.

Somebody else already did that.

Super's unoriginal action.

Ew, you can keep that.

Still Super's unoriginal action.
I ride a stegosaurus out of the megaverse. My completly original action

I...god I'm tired of this.

I instate my own universe called the UZIverse, and start an ultimate war with the Megaverse.

My UZIverse.

Yeah, I'm tired too. The thread is called *King of the* ***Hill***. Not King of the [iNSERT THING HERE].

Let's keep it to the rules -- this has easily gone far enough to warrant closing as a derailed/chatty thread. Last chance.

I claim a quiet grassy knoll topped with a small assortment of toxic flowers. It is designated ***the*** *hill*Ã¢â‚¬â€¹. There is to be no other. Bring it on.

I grab my lawnmower and cut down the flowers.

My hill

I mow you down with your own mower. I then obliterate the lawnmower so that I do not befall the same fate.

My hill.
My stegosaurus eats the hill. My hill-containing stegosaurus

I drop a Tsar Bomba on the hill so no one can have it.

I win.

![Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif](http://www.gifmania.com.pe/Gifs-Animados-Vehiculos/Gif-Animados-Aviones/Imagenes-Animadas-Aviones-De-Guerra/Supermarine-Spitfire/Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif)

Then one of these lands on the hill's remains and me so I die, the end.
My hawker hunter (better plane) ground attacks the wreck. My clean hill

All 20,000 spitfires ever built dive on the Hunter, blasting it to little, firey pieces. 

![Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif](http://www.gifmania.com.pe/Gifs-Animados-Vehiculos/Gif-Animados-Aviones/Imagenes-Animadas-Aviones-De-Guerra/Supermarine-Spitfire/Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif)![Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif](http://www.gifmania.com.pe/Gifs-Animados-Vehiculos/Gif-Animados-Aviones/Imagenes-Animadas-Aviones-De-Guerra/Supermarine-Spitfire/Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif)![Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif](http://www.gifmania.com.pe/Gifs-Animados-Vehiculos/Gif-Animados-Aviones/Imagenes-Animadas-Aviones-De-Guerra/Supermarine-Spitfire/Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif)![Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif](http://www.gifmania.com.pe/Gifs-Animados-Vehiculos/Gif-Animados-Aviones/Imagenes-Animadas-Aviones-De-Guerra/Supermarine-Spitfire/Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif)![Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif](http://www.gifmania.com.pe/Gifs-Animados-Vehiculos/Gif-Animados-Aviones/Imagenes-Animadas-Aviones-De-Guerra/Supermarine-Spitfire/Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif)![Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif](http://www.gifmania.com.pe/Gifs-Animados-Vehiculos/Gif-Animados-Aviones/Imagenes-Animadas-Aviones-De-Guerra/Supermarine-Spitfire/Supermarine-Spitfire-De-Lado-57557.gif)

and so on....

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> My stegosaurus eats the hill. My hill-containing stegosaurus

Mind blown.
All hunter prototypes team up with all hunters and sea hunters to take them out.
Grabs a Eurofighter and blasts them all to bits.
